mdBlocks.parent: Fletのアプリをより「**アプリっぽく**」することができるコントロール、**AppBar**についてご紹介します。
AppBarを使用すると、こんな感じの**画面の上部分に固定されたUI**をつくることができます。

![1000000556.jpg](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/4faae8b3-4c31-46a7-898b-465eb6114fd9/8f1dbbd6-79d1-4068-aec7-474ac321d2e7/1000000556.jpg?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466WLEAPX4T%2F20250315%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250315T021425Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjELH%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJHMEUCIQDiKYVg3w5sIGqTDiUKdhvfwXCwJ%2BQeikOZPoD7lx79RAIgacTheBuUGVgcXVYNcvmLERZhpijXUd1CmfWD1b6t20sqiAQI%2Bv%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FARAAGgw2Mzc0MjMxODM4MDUiDOCJT9fNT8Mdlp0diircA%2FOTnYHBFez%2Byxta5Btxvu8FQEr%2FDMA1Shq%2BD4tB2xfGdH7RntqSPth2a4en69qM0WXutDc7gRbmGEUDEGD70QTetCerxkKn5VhWnt3AaWWDP9Uml3ZHNhLxK%2FE7Sj2uomYpCcAJi0PLvDT%2FSwEh4TjFaSozBZkoN9vZJefnsWwNDODJBz%2F3%2Bnlf2eu1IbY10o2siyTAJY6c7QAm63k9TgcmP6x0kv8FYQ5trnV%2B5K18We1fTvxUb%2Bp6eKO5DgIWteAxMboT3Nfw13J4QAyjagJVOHQYvcQEfYZPL3yOlMLhRFh2rM1jMhTqrcLbQNsutkzEz4Gqb5n6rTrJJfYTZsXgYc2Af%2B3LLGml4hRX4F3YbF3CLDpzkppV50HNHnKrSmvOkr6yTxaIfPlwlbBcHJIV4ZDOQjYzuC%2FP8zuFPGRzOqLhUa7sA2J%2BCUJgFlcgO%2FFusSP%2FV4As2oSIOywAgdTEA4WH35kvQiY4bqLquUqSc3swEbhL9w1iFfmbqYexWZNC5evMQ%2FzHFcl5uJ5KoWjPoQKY5KJeuYMuZ9aw%2Fl%2FQ0dZdslEaQMhmEbM9eh6BRZMGiTupWwtVA6EXubGQNoayLnZ094TP11F5OpmO7%2Bp4sVoIL4f%2BKswhXHpCMO%2Bp074GOqUBCkCwfZHTC0nnNBVGyBQh6WDb071xGlRs9urqRZiqMe91vMIizI59oHlNC%2BHJHgYu4C2EcrQ8bwDM7rkI9%2FIjViPTLZwhFJkQIYDTvaYBJ1ZqTKY1cME6a6aUL0Ub4jedltSE1blhb%2BoeavpuuBIKxmzOrPi3n9OpU5VVzjw15Y65qe0sS9WhzoaXhZAzDPrM77Z28qCMXzvmS1n77Ddr87ePzeVk&X-Amz-Signature=266940987f4158bdea849052a1484cb6f270af05a7f53cddf9d595b309f81372&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
インスタグラムのアプリで言う、この部分です。
Fletで実装すると、以下のような見た目になります。
![From : https://flet.dev/docs/controls/appbar/](https://flet.dev/img/docs/controls/app-bar/app-bar.gif)
AppBarは、パソコンアプリはもちろん、スマホアプリを作るときに役立ちます。
# AppBarの実装方法
AppBarの実装方法は、これまで使用していたコントロールと少し違います。
これまで使用していたコントロールは、任意の変数に代入した後、`page.add`で画面に追加していました。

```python
# これまでのコントロール
import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):
		# 任意の変数にコントロールを代入
		text = ft.Text(value="サンプル")

		# page.addする
    page.add(text)

ft.app(target=main)
```
対する**AppBar**は、すでに名前が決まっている変数**`page.appbar`**に代入することで実装することができます。
> ✏️ `page.appbar`は`page`の<u>メンバ変数</u>ですね。
また、この`page.appbar`は`page.add`する必要はありません。
以下のコードを見てみてください⇩

```python
import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):
		# page.appbarにft.Appbarを代入
    **page.appbar = ft.AppBar(
        leading=ft.Icon(ft.icons.APPLE),
        title=ft.Text(value="アプリ名"),
        actions=[
            ft.IconButton(icon=ft.icons.MENU)
        ],
        bgcolor=ft.colors.GREEN
    )**

    text = ft.Text(value="AppBarのサンプル")

    page.add(text)

ft.app(target=main)
```
このコードを実行すると、以下のような結果になります。

![d7a1dbdf-822b-4608-a345-057581180b6f.png](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/4faae8b3-4c31-46a7-898b-465eb6114fd9/854aa77d-e999-4ca8-b277-5ca4e90b78f6/d7a1dbdf-822b-4608-a345-057581180b6f.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466WLEAPX4T%2F20250315%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250315T021425Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjELH%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJHMEUCIQDiKYVg3w5sIGqTDiUKdhvfwXCwJ%2BQeikOZPoD7lx79RAIgacTheBuUGVgcXVYNcvmLERZhpijXUd1CmfWD1b6t20sqiAQI%2Bv%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FARAAGgw2Mzc0MjMxODM4MDUiDOCJT9fNT8Mdlp0diircA%2FOTnYHBFez%2Byxta5Btxvu8FQEr%2FDMA1Shq%2BD4tB2xfGdH7RntqSPth2a4en69qM0WXutDc7gRbmGEUDEGD70QTetCerxkKn5VhWnt3AaWWDP9Uml3ZHNhLxK%2FE7Sj2uomYpCcAJi0PLvDT%2FSwEh4TjFaSozBZkoN9vZJefnsWwNDODJBz%2F3%2Bnlf2eu1IbY10o2siyTAJY6c7QAm63k9TgcmP6x0kv8FYQ5trnV%2B5K18We1fTvxUb%2Bp6eKO5DgIWteAxMboT3Nfw13J4QAyjagJVOHQYvcQEfYZPL3yOlMLhRFh2rM1jMhTqrcLbQNsutkzEz4Gqb5n6rTrJJfYTZsXgYc2Af%2B3LLGml4hRX4F3YbF3CLDpzkppV50HNHnKrSmvOkr6yTxaIfPlwlbBcHJIV4ZDOQjYzuC%2FP8zuFPGRzOqLhUa7sA2J%2BCUJgFlcgO%2FFusSP%2FV4As2oSIOywAgdTEA4WH35kvQiY4bqLquUqSc3swEbhL9w1iFfmbqYexWZNC5evMQ%2FzHFcl5uJ5KoWjPoQKY5KJeuYMuZ9aw%2Fl%2FQ0dZdslEaQMhmEbM9eh6BRZMGiTupWwtVA6EXubGQNoayLnZ094TP11F5OpmO7%2Bp4sVoIL4f%2BKswhXHpCMO%2Bp074GOqUBCkCwfZHTC0nnNBVGyBQh6WDb071xGlRs9urqRZiqMe91vMIizI59oHlNC%2BHJHgYu4C2EcrQ8bwDM7rkI9%2FIjViPTLZwhFJkQIYDTvaYBJ1ZqTKY1cME6a6aUL0Ub4jedltSE1blhb%2BoeavpuuBIKxmzOrPi3n9OpU5VVzjw15Y65qe0sS9WhzoaXhZAzDPrM77Z28qCMXzvmS1n77Ddr87ePzeVk&X-Amz-Signature=463575589f3a1cfab9e8aac994780943738b1a3f6d78d833ca9ec957db0f6089&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)

![ffb68a49-9792-4781-9d24-55d00d719022.png](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/4faae8b3-4c31-46a7-898b-465eb6114fd9/cac638af-7f1b-4896-8e31-a5fa903a7f37/ffb68a49-9792-4781-9d24-55d00d719022.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466WLEAPX4T%2F20250315%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250315T021425Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjELH%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJHMEUCIQDiKYVg3w5sIGqTDiUKdhvfwXCwJ%2BQeikOZPoD7lx79RAIgacTheBuUGVgcXVYNcvmLERZhpijXUd1CmfWD1b6t20sqiAQI%2Bv%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FARAAGgw2Mzc0MjMxODM4MDUiDOCJT9fNT8Mdlp0diircA%2FOTnYHBFez%2Byxta5Btxvu8FQEr%2FDMA1Shq%2BD4tB2xfGdH7RntqSPth2a4en69qM0WXutDc7gRbmGEUDEGD70QTetCerxkKn5VhWnt3AaWWDP9Uml3ZHNhLxK%2FE7Sj2uomYpCcAJi0PLvDT%2FSwEh4TjFaSozBZkoN9vZJefnsWwNDODJBz%2F3%2Bnlf2eu1IbY10o2siyTAJY6c7QAm63k9TgcmP6x0kv8FYQ5trnV%2B5K18We1fTvxUb%2Bp6eKO5DgIWteAxMboT3Nfw13J4QAyjagJVOHQYvcQEfYZPL3yOlMLhRFh2rM1jMhTqrcLbQNsutkzEz4Gqb5n6rTrJJfYTZsXgYc2Af%2B3LLGml4hRX4F3YbF3CLDpzkppV50HNHnKrSmvOkr6yTxaIfPlwlbBcHJIV4ZDOQjYzuC%2FP8zuFPGRzOqLhUa7sA2J%2BCUJgFlcgO%2FFusSP%2FV4As2oSIOywAgdTEA4WH35kvQiY4bqLquUqSc3swEbhL9w1iFfmbqYexWZNC5evMQ%2FzHFcl5uJ5KoWjPoQKY5KJeuYMuZ9aw%2Fl%2FQ0dZdslEaQMhmEbM9eh6BRZMGiTupWwtVA6EXubGQNoayLnZ094TP11F5OpmO7%2Bp4sVoIL4f%2BKswhXHpCMO%2Bp074GOqUBCkCwfZHTC0nnNBVGyBQh6WDb071xGlRs9urqRZiqMe91vMIizI59oHlNC%2BHJHgYu4C2EcrQ8bwDM7rkI9%2FIjViPTLZwhFJkQIYDTvaYBJ1ZqTKY1cME6a6aUL0Ub4jedltSE1blhb%2BoeavpuuBIKxmzOrPi3n9OpU5VVzjw15Y65qe0sS9WhzoaXhZAzDPrM77Z28qCMXzvmS1n77Ddr87ePzeVk&X-Amz-Signature=9d20c9a803713053b250a2699d2ddbd66dccf5b87a584b30650808f15e47b1a7&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
# AppBarの役割
AppBarには、主に3つの役割があります。一つづつ順番に紹介していきますね。
## タイトルの表示
### `title`プロパティ
AppBarの`title`プロパティに`ft.Text`コントロールを渡すと、AppBarに好きな文字列を表示させることができます。
アプリの名前などを表示すると良いでしょう。

```python
import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):
    page.appbar = ft.AppBar(
        **title=ft.Text(value="アプリ名"),**
        bgcolor=ft.colors.BLACK12
    )

    text = ft.Text(value="AppBarのタイトルのサンプル")

    page.add(text)

ft.app(target=main)
```

![0b9a27b4-6b11-463b-a93a-852bbbf668b8.png](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/4faae8b3-4c31-46a7-898b-465eb6114fd9/ae95db3a-37fc-486e-9e70-675a32b6cb3b/0b9a27b4-6b11-463b-a93a-852bbbf668b8.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466WLEAPX4T%2F20250315%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250315T021425Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjELH%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJHMEUCIQDiKYVg3w5sIGqTDiUKdhvfwXCwJ%2BQeikOZPoD7lx79RAIgacTheBuUGVgcXVYNcvmLERZhpijXUd1CmfWD1b6t20sqiAQI%2Bv%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FARAAGgw2Mzc0MjMxODM4MDUiDOCJT9fNT8Mdlp0diircA%2FOTnYHBFez%2Byxta5Btxvu8FQEr%2FDMA1Shq%2BD4tB2xfGdH7RntqSPth2a4en69qM0WXutDc7gRbmGEUDEGD70QTetCerxkKn5VhWnt3AaWWDP9Uml3ZHNhLxK%2FE7Sj2uomYpCcAJi0PLvDT%2FSwEh4TjFaSozBZkoN9vZJefnsWwNDODJBz%2F3%2Bnlf2eu1IbY10o2siyTAJY6c7QAm63k9TgcmP6x0kv8FYQ5trnV%2B5K18We1fTvxUb%2Bp6eKO5DgIWteAxMboT3Nfw13J4QAyjagJVOHQYvcQEfYZPL3yOlMLhRFh2rM1jMhTqrcLbQNsutkzEz4Gqb5n6rTrJJfYTZsXgYc2Af%2B3LLGml4hRX4F3YbF3CLDpzkppV50HNHnKrSmvOkr6yTxaIfPlwlbBcHJIV4ZDOQjYzuC%2FP8zuFPGRzOqLhUa7sA2J%2BCUJgFlcgO%2FFusSP%2FV4As2oSIOywAgdTEA4WH35kvQiY4bqLquUqSc3swEbhL9w1iFfmbqYexWZNC5evMQ%2FzHFcl5uJ5KoWjPoQKY5KJeuYMuZ9aw%2Fl%2FQ0dZdslEaQMhmEbM9eh6BRZMGiTupWwtVA6EXubGQNoayLnZ094TP11F5OpmO7%2Bp4sVoIL4f%2BKswhXHpCMO%2Bp074GOqUBCkCwfZHTC0nnNBVGyBQh6WDb071xGlRs9urqRZiqMe91vMIizI59oHlNC%2BHJHgYu4C2EcrQ8bwDM7rkI9%2FIjViPTLZwhFJkQIYDTvaYBJ1ZqTKY1cME6a6aUL0Ub4jedltSE1blhb%2BoeavpuuBIKxmzOrPi3n9OpU5VVzjw15Y65qe0sS9WhzoaXhZAzDPrM77Z28qCMXzvmS1n77Ddr87ePzeVk&X-Amz-Signature=47043b7526fbd1a8f07e481c3583b2006b877bb0350780e058052dc5a8a09538&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
`title`プロパティに渡すのは`ft.Text`コントロールなので、サイズやフォント、色を好きにカスタマイズできます。

```python
import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):
    page.fonts = {
        "Jacquarda" : "/fonts/JacquardaBastarda9-Regular.ttf"
    }

    page.appbar = ft.AppBar(
        title=**ft.Text(
            value="Applicarion Name",
            color=ft.colors.CYAN,
            size=35,
            font_family="Jacquarda"
        )**,
        bgcolor=ft.colors.BLUE_GREY_50
    )

    text = ft.Text(value="AppBarのタイトルのサンプル") 

    page.add(text)

ft.app(target=main)
```

![61b18d9c-cdd2-4459-8d1a-22e3ff246abd.png](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/4faae8b3-4c31-46a7-898b-465eb6114fd9/e1bf9678-b68a-40b8-93d7-0b2a093f5e5b/61b18d9c-cdd2-4459-8d1a-22e3ff246abd.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466WLEAPX4T%2F20250315%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250315T021425Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjELH%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJHMEUCIQDiKYVg3w5sIGqTDiUKdhvfwXCwJ%2BQeikOZPoD7lx79RAIgacTheBuUGVgcXVYNcvmLERZhpijXUd1CmfWD1b6t20sqiAQI%2Bv%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FARAAGgw2Mzc0MjMxODM4MDUiDOCJT9fNT8Mdlp0diircA%2FOTnYHBFez%2Byxta5Btxvu8FQEr%2FDMA1Shq%2BD4tB2xfGdH7RntqSPth2a4en69qM0WXutDc7gRbmGEUDEGD70QTetCerxkKn5VhWnt3AaWWDP9Uml3ZHNhLxK%2FE7Sj2uomYpCcAJi0PLvDT%2FSwEh4TjFaSozBZkoN9vZJefnsWwNDODJBz%2F3%2Bnlf2eu1IbY10o2siyTAJY6c7QAm63k9TgcmP6x0kv8FYQ5trnV%2B5K18We1fTvxUb%2Bp6eKO5DgIWteAxMboT3Nfw13J4QAyjagJVOHQYvcQEfYZPL3yOlMLhRFh2rM1jMhTqrcLbQNsutkzEz4Gqb5n6rTrJJfYTZsXgYc2Af%2B3LLGml4hRX4F3YbF3CLDpzkppV50HNHnKrSmvOkr6yTxaIfPlwlbBcHJIV4ZDOQjYzuC%2FP8zuFPGRzOqLhUa7sA2J%2BCUJgFlcgO%2FFusSP%2FV4As2oSIOywAgdTEA4WH35kvQiY4bqLquUqSc3swEbhL9w1iFfmbqYexWZNC5evMQ%2FzHFcl5uJ5KoWjPoQKY5KJeuYMuZ9aw%2Fl%2FQ0dZdslEaQMhmEbM9eh6BRZMGiTupWwtVA6EXubGQNoayLnZ094TP11F5OpmO7%2Bp4sVoIL4f%2BKswhXHpCMO%2Bp074GOqUBCkCwfZHTC0nnNBVGyBQh6WDb071xGlRs9urqRZiqMe91vMIizI59oHlNC%2BHJHgYu4C2EcrQ8bwDM7rkI9%2FIjViPTLZwhFJkQIYDTvaYBJ1ZqTKY1cME6a6aUL0Ub4jedltSE1blhb%2BoeavpuuBIKxmzOrPi3n9OpU5VVzjw15Y65qe0sS9WhzoaXhZAzDPrM77Z28qCMXzvmS1n77Ddr87ePzeVk&X-Amz-Signature=3c926f7cee3951729b901f3df861618686336faa14160cf01f2e35d0d9656900&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
`ft.Text`コントロールの詳しい使用方法は、以下を参照してください。
[bookmark](https://flet.dev/docs/controls/text/)
### タイトルの中央寄せ
先ほどの例ではタイトルが左寄りになっていましたが、以下のように中央に寄せることもできます。

![center_title.png](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/4faae8b3-4c31-46a7-898b-465eb6114fd9/e56d3a00-57e2-4016-9f36-425965a667e3/center_title.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466WLEAPX4T%2F20250315%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250315T021425Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjELH%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJHMEUCIQDiKYVg3w5sIGqTDiUKdhvfwXCwJ%2BQeikOZPoD7lx79RAIgacTheBuUGVgcXVYNcvmLERZhpijXUd1CmfWD1b6t20sqiAQI%2Bv%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FARAAGgw2Mzc0MjMxODM4MDUiDOCJT9fNT8Mdlp0diircA%2FOTnYHBFez%2Byxta5Btxvu8FQEr%2FDMA1Shq%2BD4tB2xfGdH7RntqSPth2a4en69qM0WXutDc7gRbmGEUDEGD70QTetCerxkKn5VhWnt3AaWWDP9Uml3ZHNhLxK%2FE7Sj2uomYpCcAJi0PLvDT%2FSwEh4TjFaSozBZkoN9vZJefnsWwNDODJBz%2F3%2Bnlf2eu1IbY10o2siyTAJY6c7QAm63k9TgcmP6x0kv8FYQ5trnV%2B5K18We1fTvxUb%2Bp6eKO5DgIWteAxMboT3Nfw13J4QAyjagJVOHQYvcQEfYZPL3yOlMLhRFh2rM1jMhTqrcLbQNsutkzEz4Gqb5n6rTrJJfYTZsXgYc2Af%2B3LLGml4hRX4F3YbF3CLDpzkppV50HNHnKrSmvOkr6yTxaIfPlwlbBcHJIV4ZDOQjYzuC%2FP8zuFPGRzOqLhUa7sA2J%2BCUJgFlcgO%2FFusSP%2FV4As2oSIOywAgdTEA4WH35kvQiY4bqLquUqSc3swEbhL9w1iFfmbqYexWZNC5evMQ%2FzHFcl5uJ5KoWjPoQKY5KJeuYMuZ9aw%2Fl%2FQ0dZdslEaQMhmEbM9eh6BRZMGiTupWwtVA6EXubGQNoayLnZ094TP11F5OpmO7%2Bp4sVoIL4f%2BKswhXHpCMO%2Bp074GOqUBCkCwfZHTC0nnNBVGyBQh6WDb071xGlRs9urqRZiqMe91vMIizI59oHlNC%2BHJHgYu4C2EcrQ8bwDM7rkI9%2FIjViPTLZwhFJkQIYDTvaYBJ1ZqTKY1cME6a6aUL0Ub4jedltSE1blhb%2BoeavpuuBIKxmzOrPi3n9OpU5VVzjw15Y65qe0sS9WhzoaXhZAzDPrM77Z28qCMXzvmS1n77Ddr87ePzeVk&X-Amz-Signature=1ee71f75f2c1d63dbdc20212dbe08a96cae2bc782645a1a9f335c649b56c4323&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
タイトルを中央に寄せるためには、`center_title`プロパティを`True`を設定します。

```python
import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):

    page.appbar = ft.AppBar(
        title=ft.Text(value="Applicarion Name"),
        # タイトルを中央寄せ
        **center_title=True**,
        bgcolor=ft.colors.BLUE_GREY_50
    )

    text = ft.Text(value="AppBarのタイトルのサンプル") 

    page.add(text)

ft.app(target=main)
```
## アイコンの表示
### `leading`プロパティ
このAppBarの左側には、そのアプリを象徴するアイコンを配置することができます。

![9b338a43-a54c-433a-adc8-7e3f6374712e.png](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/4faae8b3-4c31-46a7-898b-465eb6114fd9/5b4e50fa-d3ad-4575-a089-a21e900514b3/9b338a43-a54c-433a-adc8-7e3f6374712e.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466WLEAPX4T%2F20250315%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250315T021425Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjELH%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJHMEUCIQDiKYVg3w5sIGqTDiUKdhvfwXCwJ%2BQeikOZPoD7lx79RAIgacTheBuUGVgcXVYNcvmLERZhpijXUd1CmfWD1b6t20sqiAQI%2Bv%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FARAAGgw2Mzc0MjMxODM4MDUiDOCJT9fNT8Mdlp0diircA%2FOTnYHBFez%2Byxta5Btxvu8FQEr%2FDMA1Shq%2BD4tB2xfGdH7RntqSPth2a4en69qM0WXutDc7gRbmGEUDEGD70QTetCerxkKn5VhWnt3AaWWDP9Uml3ZHNhLxK%2FE7Sj2uomYpCcAJi0PLvDT%2FSwEh4TjFaSozBZkoN9vZJefnsWwNDODJBz%2F3%2Bnlf2eu1IbY10o2siyTAJY6c7QAm63k9TgcmP6x0kv8FYQ5trnV%2B5K18We1fTvxUb%2Bp6eKO5DgIWteAxMboT3Nfw13J4QAyjagJVOHQYvcQEfYZPL3yOlMLhRFh2rM1jMhTqrcLbQNsutkzEz4Gqb5n6rTrJJfYTZsXgYc2Af%2B3LLGml4hRX4F3YbF3CLDpzkppV50HNHnKrSmvOkr6yTxaIfPlwlbBcHJIV4ZDOQjYzuC%2FP8zuFPGRzOqLhUa7sA2J%2BCUJgFlcgO%2FFusSP%2FV4As2oSIOywAgdTEA4WH35kvQiY4bqLquUqSc3swEbhL9w1iFfmbqYexWZNC5evMQ%2FzHFcl5uJ5KoWjPoQKY5KJeuYMuZ9aw%2Fl%2FQ0dZdslEaQMhmEbM9eh6BRZMGiTupWwtVA6EXubGQNoayLnZ094TP11F5OpmO7%2Bp4sVoIL4f%2BKswhXHpCMO%2Bp074GOqUBCkCwfZHTC0nnNBVGyBQh6WDb071xGlRs9urqRZiqMe91vMIizI59oHlNC%2BHJHgYu4C2EcrQ8bwDM7rkI9%2FIjViPTLZwhFJkQIYDTvaYBJ1ZqTKY1cME6a6aUL0Ub4jedltSE1blhb%2BoeavpuuBIKxmzOrPi3n9OpU5VVzjw15Y65qe0sS9WhzoaXhZAzDPrM77Z28qCMXzvmS1n77Ddr87ePzeVk&X-Amz-Signature=b0cd3bd4eae1231f500450b85d5868a7b2f59e73cc51487ee998a48bc19d9aa9&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
この`leading`プロパティには、`ft.Icon`コントロールを設定することができます。

```python
import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):

    page.appbar = ft.AppBar(
		    # 左端に配置するアイコン
        **leading=ft.Icon(ft.icons.TIPS_AND_UPDATES),**
        bgcolor=ft.colors.BLUE_GREY_50
    )

    text = ft.Text(value="AppBarのアイコンのサンプル")  # valueを省略

    page.add(text)

ft.app(target=main)
```
この`ft.Icon`コントロールで使用できるアイコンは、以下の[アイコンブラウザー](https://gallery.flet.dev/icons-browser/)で調べる事ができます。
[bookmark](https://gallery.flet.dev/icons-browser/)

> ☝ ちなみに…  
> 実は、`leading`に設定できるのは**アイコンだけではありません**。  
>   
> `leading`には様々なコントロール（おそらくほぼすべて）を設定でき、例えば画像やテキスト、任意のボタンを設置することもできます。  
>   
> コード例と実行例

children.parent: 実は、`leading`に設定できるのは**アイコンだけではありません**。
`leading`には様々なコントロール（おそらくほぼすべて）を設定でき、例えば画像やテキスト、任意のボタンを設置することもできます。

```python
import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):

    page.appbar = ft.AppBar(
        title=ft.Text(value="Horizon"),
        leading=ft.Container(
            content=ft.Image(
                src="/horizon_icon.png",
            ),
            padding=10
        ),
        toolbar_height=70,
        leading_width=70,
        bgcolor=ft.colors.BLUE_GREY_50
    )

    text = ft.Text(value="AppBarのアイコンのサンプル")  # valueを省略

    page.add(text)

ft.app(target=main)
```

mdBlocks.parent: ## 固定ボタンの設置
### `actions`プロパティ
AppBarの右側には、複数のボタンを設置することができます。インスタのAppBarでいうDMボタンですね。

![%E3%82%A4%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B9%E3%82%BF%E3%81%AEAppBar.jpg](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/4faae8b3-4c31-46a7-898b-465eb6114fd9/ba5956d1-8349-4a15-bf28-3820bc6a1bdc/%E3%82%A4%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B9%E3%82%BF%E3%81%AEAppBar.jpg?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466WLEAPX4T%2F20250315%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250315T021425Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjELH%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJHMEUCIQDiKYVg3w5sIGqTDiUKdhvfwXCwJ%2BQeikOZPoD7lx79RAIgacTheBuUGVgcXVYNcvmLERZhpijXUd1CmfWD1b6t20sqiAQI%2Bv%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FARAAGgw2Mzc0MjMxODM4MDUiDOCJT9fNT8Mdlp0diircA%2FOTnYHBFez%2Byxta5Btxvu8FQEr%2FDMA1Shq%2BD4tB2xfGdH7RntqSPth2a4en69qM0WXutDc7gRbmGEUDEGD70QTetCerxkKn5VhWnt3AaWWDP9Uml3ZHNhLxK%2FE7Sj2uomYpCcAJi0PLvDT%2FSwEh4TjFaSozBZkoN9vZJefnsWwNDODJBz%2F3%2Bnlf2eu1IbY10o2siyTAJY6c7QAm63k9TgcmP6x0kv8FYQ5trnV%2B5K18We1fTvxUb%2Bp6eKO5DgIWteAxMboT3Nfw13J4QAyjagJVOHQYvcQEfYZPL3yOlMLhRFh2rM1jMhTqrcLbQNsutkzEz4Gqb5n6rTrJJfYTZsXgYc2Af%2B3LLGml4hRX4F3YbF3CLDpzkppV50HNHnKrSmvOkr6yTxaIfPlwlbBcHJIV4ZDOQjYzuC%2FP8zuFPGRzOqLhUa7sA2J%2BCUJgFlcgO%2FFusSP%2FV4As2oSIOywAgdTEA4WH35kvQiY4bqLquUqSc3swEbhL9w1iFfmbqYexWZNC5evMQ%2FzHFcl5uJ5KoWjPoQKY5KJeuYMuZ9aw%2Fl%2FQ0dZdslEaQMhmEbM9eh6BRZMGiTupWwtVA6EXubGQNoayLnZ094TP11F5OpmO7%2Bp4sVoIL4f%2BKswhXHpCMO%2Bp074GOqUBCkCwfZHTC0nnNBVGyBQh6WDb071xGlRs9urqRZiqMe91vMIizI59oHlNC%2BHJHgYu4C2EcrQ8bwDM7rkI9%2FIjViPTLZwhFJkQIYDTvaYBJ1ZqTKY1cME6a6aUL0Ub4jedltSE1blhb%2BoeavpuuBIKxmzOrPi3n9OpU5VVzjw15Y65qe0sS9WhzoaXhZAzDPrM77Z28qCMXzvmS1n77Ddr87ePzeVk&X-Amz-Signature=240bc337698799d6da9ee55456b1a6945bb71b7d00e78b6ebd7debeaf3a0daea&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
一般的には`ft.IconButton`コントロールを設置します。
このボタンは、**`antions`**プロパティにリスト形式で複数の`ft.IconButtons`を与えることで設定します。

```python
import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):

    page.appbar = ft.AppBar(
        actions=[
            ft.IconButton(ft.icons.MESSAGE),
            ft.IconButton(ft.icons.CALENDAR_MONTH),
            ft.IconButton(ft.icons.SETTINGS)
        ],
        bgcolor=ft.colors.BLUE_GREY_50
    )

    text = ft.Text(value="AppBarの固定ボタンのサンプル")  # valueを省略

    page.add(text)

ft.app(target=main)
```

![actions.png](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/4faae8b3-4c31-46a7-898b-465eb6114fd9/81f429aa-2cb8-48ec-b7a7-78fff8764818/actions.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466WLEAPX4T%2F20250315%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250315T021425Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjELH%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJHMEUCIQDiKYVg3w5sIGqTDiUKdhvfwXCwJ%2BQeikOZPoD7lx79RAIgacTheBuUGVgcXVYNcvmLERZhpijXUd1CmfWD1b6t20sqiAQI%2Bv%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FARAAGgw2Mzc0MjMxODM4MDUiDOCJT9fNT8Mdlp0diircA%2FOTnYHBFez%2Byxta5Btxvu8FQEr%2FDMA1Shq%2BD4tB2xfGdH7RntqSPth2a4en69qM0WXutDc7gRbmGEUDEGD70QTetCerxkKn5VhWnt3AaWWDP9Uml3ZHNhLxK%2FE7Sj2uomYpCcAJi0PLvDT%2FSwEh4TjFaSozBZkoN9vZJefnsWwNDODJBz%2F3%2Bnlf2eu1IbY10o2siyTAJY6c7QAm63k9TgcmP6x0kv8FYQ5trnV%2B5K18We1fTvxUb%2Bp6eKO5DgIWteAxMboT3Nfw13J4QAyjagJVOHQYvcQEfYZPL3yOlMLhRFh2rM1jMhTqrcLbQNsutkzEz4Gqb5n6rTrJJfYTZsXgYc2Af%2B3LLGml4hRX4F3YbF3CLDpzkppV50HNHnKrSmvOkr6yTxaIfPlwlbBcHJIV4ZDOQjYzuC%2FP8zuFPGRzOqLhUa7sA2J%2BCUJgFlcgO%2FFusSP%2FV4As2oSIOywAgdTEA4WH35kvQiY4bqLquUqSc3swEbhL9w1iFfmbqYexWZNC5evMQ%2FzHFcl5uJ5KoWjPoQKY5KJeuYMuZ9aw%2Fl%2FQ0dZdslEaQMhmEbM9eh6BRZMGiTupWwtVA6EXubGQNoayLnZ094TP11F5OpmO7%2Bp4sVoIL4f%2BKswhXHpCMO%2Bp074GOqUBCkCwfZHTC0nnNBVGyBQh6WDb071xGlRs9urqRZiqMe91vMIizI59oHlNC%2BHJHgYu4C2EcrQ8bwDM7rkI9%2FIjViPTLZwhFJkQIYDTvaYBJ1ZqTKY1cME6a6aUL0Ub4jedltSE1blhb%2BoeavpuuBIKxmzOrPi3n9OpU5VVzjw15Y65qe0sS9WhzoaXhZAzDPrM77Z28qCMXzvmS1n77Ddr87ePzeVk&X-Amz-Signature=8d95bc654459c7da98dd89daf8e9169edc4473ea6d253bbf5160acad81b3e4ba&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
専用の関数を作成し、ボタンにイベントハンドラを設定することで、特定の処理を呼び出したり他の画面に遷移することができるようになります。

childPages.title: ルーティング練習問題
カスタムコントロール
